title: Table
name: Table
description:
Builds a table in a CFML page. Use the cfcol tag to define table column and row
  characteristics. The cftable tag renders data either as preformatted text, or, with the HTMLTable
  attribute, as an HTML table. Use cftable to create tables if you don't want to write HTML table tag
  code, or if your data can be well presented as preformatted text.

attributes.name: query
attributes.description: Name of the cfquery from which to draw data.

attributes.name: maxRows
attributes.description: Maximum number of rows to display in the table.

attributes.name: colSpacing
attributes.description: Number of spaces to insert between columns 'default is 2'.

attributes.name: headerLines
attributes.description:
Number of lines to use for the table header. The default is 2, which leaves one line between
		the headers and the first row of the table.

attributes.name: HTMLTable
attributes.description: Renders the table as an HTML 3.0 table.

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: Adds a border to the table. Use only when you specify the HTMLTable attribute for the table.

attributes.name: colHeaders
attributes.description: Displays headers for each column, as specified in the cfcol tag.

attributes.name: startRow
attributes.description: Specifies the query row from which to start processing.
